channel.title: How servers work
channel.description:
I've been reading through numerous sources, trying to piece together how everything works. So far, I've had no prevail >.<
Could someone explain how the client talks to the server with packets, then how the server deciphers those packets?
I am very fluent in multiple languages, and I'm having a bit of trouble putting all of this together. Once I understand all of this i believe I will have a much easier time working from the basics.
Thank you in advance.

item.title: How servers work
item.dc:creator: @helbringer22 helbringer22
item.description:
@helbringer22 wrote:

[quote=“tehsandbox, post:4, topic:403451”][quote author=helbringer22 link=topic=500514.msg3660332#msg3660332 date=1310327595]

they are infused with magic that makes them work

Thanks for being a smart ass.
[/quote]
what? thats not right?[/quote]
Nope I think the packets have an id #, but I can’t find the part in the server which receives the packets

Read full topic
